channel.title: Triple HHH
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Triple HHH"

item.title: Re: Triple HHH
item.content:encoded: i missed at him with EDUT for about six times in a row, before I gave up

item.title: Re: Triple HHH
item.content:encoded: I was trying to get him from the C-Rank missions but now that I have every C-Rank ally except him I figured I would just farm him from the training missions. Cept even with White Eye I missed him with my last 8 missions for the day >_< I've been avoiding the EDU for a while, I may have to pick it up =/

item.title: Re: Triple HHH
item.content:encoded: I've heard people getting him from training missions pretty quick using EDUT. They do count towards Timmy training too. Personally, I got him from the C-Rank, because I knew I'd be doing a bunch of those anyway.

item.title: Triple HHH
item.content:encoded: Is the best way to get him just doing those training missions over and over and over? Also, do they count for Timmy's training? :) I should be special Jonin come Monday unless something happens to take my stamina away to badly.
